    • isWithinTolerance

      public boolean isWithinTolerance(double expectedValue, double actualValue, double tolerance)
      Returns true if the passed expectedValue is within tolerance of the passed actualValue. Otherwise it returns false. For example, if the expectedValue is 10, the actualValue is 11, and tolerance is 2, then true will be returned.
      Parameters:
      expectedValue -
      actualValue -
      tolerance -
      Returns:
